name: the river that separates them both
name_original: the river that separates them both
description:
You aren't sure how you got here. Random blobs of color surround you, forming what could be called a town. Your focus isn't on this blurry mess, however. A little bit out from the somewhat familiar looking colors, you see a river. On the edge of the river, you see a girl kicking the water. You take a chance and venture out to her for conversation.

___---***---___

hi! thank you for taking interest in this project! i made this as a way to figure out how twine works. very low effort, mostly because i don't expect anything from it. i'll probably make more later on to figure out more complex elements. until then, please enjoy your stay!

i put this down as interactive fiction, but there's not a lot of interaction. sorry about that! <:)
